statements: UPDATE inventory_metrics SET inventory_level = 100, turnover_rate = 0.05 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_metrics SET profit_margin = 0.25, inventory_level = 75 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory_metrics SET inventory_level = 100, turnover_rate = 0.05 WHERE product_id = 1;
UPDATE inventory_metrics SET profit_margin = 0.25, inventory_level = 150 WHERE product_id = 2;
UPDATE inventory SET stock_level = 15 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET sale_amount = 500.00, profit_margin = 0.20 WHERE sale_id = 3;
UPDATE inventory SET stock_level = stock_level - 5, inventory_value = inventory_value - 1000 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE sales SET sale_amount = sale_amount + 50.25, profit_margin = 0.20 WHERE sale_id = 1001;
UPDATE inventory_turnover SET turnover_rate = 0.25, last_updated = '2022-01-15' WHERE product_id = 123
UPDATE profit_margins SET profit_margin = 0.15, date = '2022-01-20' WHERE product_id = 456
UPDATE inventory_turnover SET turnover_rate = 1.5 WHERE product_id = 123;
UPDATE stock_levels SET stock_quantity = stock_quantity + 50, last_updated = NOW() WHERE product_id = 456 AND location_id = 789;
UPDATE inventory_turnover SET turnover_rate = 2.5 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE stock_levels SET current_stock = 100 WHERE product_name = 'ProductA';
UPDATE inventory_turnover SET turnover_rate = 0.75 WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE profit_margin SET margin_percentage = 12.5 WHERE product_name = 'Product A';
UPDATE inventory_turnover SET turnover_rate = 0.75, last_updated = NOW() WHERE product_id = 101
UPDATE stock_levels SET stock_level = 50, last_updated = '2022-01-31 08:00:00' WHERE product_id = 201
UPDATE inventory_turnover SET turnover_rate = 0.75, last_updated = '2022-10-15' WHERE product_id = 101
